name: Theseus (itch) (Burak Demir)
description: Theseus, 3d procedurally generated labyrinth game. It is based on Greek myth Theseus and Minotaur. Made with URP. There are lots of npc’s available in the game. At every new game, labyrinths are generated procedurally and randomly. So, every time players sees a different map. Also, npc’s are distributed according to distance based algorithm. When the get closer to the final room in the labyrinth npc’s getting stronger. In the final room, user faces with the strongest npc which is Minotaur. If the user can kill the Minotaur, the game ends. It’s still under development, with some missing features
